happy: If my mind can conceive it, if my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it. -Muhammed Ali
The most wasted of days is one without laughter. -E.E. Cummings
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do. -Steve Jobs
sad: You're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. -A.A. Milne
There is always light, if only we/re brave enough to see it. If only we/re brave enough to be it. -Amanda Gorman
Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for. -Jennifer Lopez
fearful: There's no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we face it. -George R.R. Martin
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. -Franklin D. Roosevelt
There is no failure except in no longer trying. -Elbert Hubbard
angry: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow. -Chinese Proverb
Not being outraged by anything is a superpower. -James Pierce
Speak when you are angry and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret. -Ambrose Bierce
depressed: Don't ignore the lessons of pain nor walk the same path again, or it may happen again. Strive to preserve your new-found peace. -Terry Mark
Don't desire happiness because it creates only unhappiness and nothing else. -Osho
Worrying doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrows; it empties today of its strengths. -Corrie Ten Boom
